name: Hitwicket Cricket Superstars
description:
Lead a Cricket Team with Superpowers in a Realistic Multiplayer Setting & Compete with Millions in World Cricket Championships! Tune into a Mobile Cricket Game that Combines Strategy AND Sports like nothing else you have ever seen before. Own a team of Cricketing Superstars and dive into a new exciting 3D Multiplayer Cricket Game!

“#1 - Gaming, PM’s App Innovation Challenge”
"Best App Award" - HYSEA
"Top 10 Global Startups in Sports Innovation" - HYPE UK
"Top 30 Gaming Startups Across Asia" - Google Indie Games Accelerator 2018

Enjoy easy to play Competitive Cricket Modes & Championship matches that test your skills to your limits. Train your Cricketers from Reliable Rookies to World Class Superstars and battle it out in realistic multiplayer matches that pit you against the best cricket lovers world wide!

Play consistently & beat your opponents, revive your winning history and emerge as a cricketing giant of the world. Live a World Class Cricketing Experience as you strive for the World Cup in one of the most exciting Cricket Games of 2021!

Go on a World Tour & play thrilling cricket matches against teams from India, Australia, England, Bangladesh, Sri Lanka & much more. Recruit excellent players through scouting or win them by bidding in the auctions!

Compete with your friends & a million Cricket Teams across the world to stand out as a legend of the sport - all while immersing yourself in a unique Cricket Game!

It’s fun and addictive, join the fandom today!

FEATURES

AMAZING SUPERPOWERS

- Dreamy, fantasy-like unreal effects for Batsmen & Bowlers
- ‘SMASH’, ‘HEX’ & ‘BOOMERANG’ your opponents to win!
- Stylish 3D animation to blow your minds away

SIMPLE CONTROLS

- ZERO Hand-eye Coordination needed
- All you need is your thumb!

QUICK 3-MINUTE MATCHES

- 5 & 10-Over Matches for exciting run chases
- Thrilling Cricket Championship Matches in the blink of an eye!

MULTIPLAYER LEAGUE

- Battle against real players in challenging 1v1 Cricket matches
- Indulge in Gritty Revenge Cricket to redeem lost matches!
- Climb up the leagues & top the leaderboard!
- Be the best in your City & the Cricketing world!

ALLIANCE WARS

- Team up with a Million Cricket Fans world wide
- Compete, Cooperate & Share vital strategies
- Challenge other alliances & defend your own
- Compete along with your friends and lift the Cricket World Cup!

3D CRICKET EXPERIENCE

- Easy to play, 3D Cricket Gameplay
- Riveting Bowling & Batting animations
- Beautiful realistic visuals & motion captured animations
- Stunning Graphics & Camera Angles

CHOOSE YOUR CITY

- REPRESENT your city in a multiplayer cricket championship game!
- Choose among multiple cities and nations
- Beat the best in your City & Rise to the Top!

ELITE ACADEMY

- Add Stars to your Favorite Cricketers
- Unlock Hidden Cricketing Talent
- Give your Cricket Team an edge others can’t!

AUCTION

- Unique, Realistic Auction
- Bid for the best cricketers around!

DREAM TEAM

- Build your own World Class Cricket Team
- Train your Champs and Turn them into Epic Superstars
- Dominate the World of Cricket Gaming with your fingertips!

EXCITING GAMEPLAY

- Exciting, unpredictable algorithm
- Every Cricket Championship Game, a nail-biter!
- Massive Multiplayer with a Million Cricket Lovers world wide

PROGRESS BACKUP

-Login through Facebook/Google & save your in-game progress
-With Hitwicket ID, you can play the cricket game from any device
